title: The island princess, or, The generous Portugal a comedy, as it is acted at the Theatre Royal by His Majesties servants.
author: Fletcher, John, 1579-1625.
publisher: Printed for H.R. and A.M., and are to be sold by William Cademan and Robert Pask,
notes: "By Fletcher only"-Fleay, Biog. chron. Eng. drama. Cf. also Camb. hist. Eng. lit., v. 6, p. 157.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
